delete_vault_modal_content: Are you sure you want to delete the {{vaultName}} Vault?
delete_vault_modal_warning: Careful! This action will delete all associated services.
delete_vault_banner_error: An error has occurred. Please wait a few minutes and try again.
delete_vault_disabled_tooltip: You cannot delete a Vault linked to VSPC Tenants.
unable_to_delete_vault_feature_unavailab: For security reasons, a Vault cannot be deleted via the interface. If you would like to delete a Vault, please contact support.
